name: Noob RPG
storyline: Horizon 4.2 is the Massive Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG) to have and play. Every day, millions of players are exploring the virtual world of Olydri, experiencing epic adventures without leaving home. Among them, May is the leader of the guild Rush. Every giving day she is struggling to push his fellowship to the ultimate reward: level 100. In this painful journey she is going with Baster, Drek, and Logs. In this game, players’ teamwork is vital, so they must assist and, more important, stand each other to complete quests, explore dungeons, survive the wilds and fight deadly monsters to level up and fill up their inventory.
summary:
Noob RPG is a transmedia license on the subject of Massive
Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG). In this game, you will be able to go from the real world to the virtual world to try to reach level 100, then legendary.
